Articles.Content:
I see the OP just fine. Not sure what's going on but if the forums are acting funny, sometimes it helps to just walk away for an hour or so. Things usually work themselves out.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

EW THAT IS UGLY

apply flat shading, and it will look 100x better.

I don't see the OP, the #1 post I see is a response from duncan1297 saying they can't see the pictures. Edit: I see it now, Thanks.

Edited August 22, 2013 by smurphy34
Fixed

looks good nice idea, i liked it so much i gave it a go myself

What do you think ?

looks good nice idea, i liked it so much i gave it a go myself

What do you think ?

Thats the opening style I wanted to use for my SS-18 silo. Right now I work on the model for my SS-18.

The silocover of the Minuteman III silo opens similar to mine.

greetings

Themorris
This is pretty great! I'll definitely be following this, it'll be a nice option for small probes and such.

So,

I think I will be starting to work on a new silo at the weekend, so this

will fit in

It's an soviet R-36M (NATO: SS-18).

But I think I will be able to texture the old silo today or tomorrow.

greetings

Themorris
*clap* *clap* *clap* *clap* fantastic!!! Keep it up!
Amazing!!!
Sweet! Does it come with a calculator for ballistic flight? I would be *very* interested in such a feature
Now I have to make a Titan II warhead for my FASA mod !!!!

Sweet! Does it come with a calculator for ballistic flight? I would be *very* interested in such a feature

I don't know much about creating modules, but I think I will take a look at this...

Maybe a modified version of mechjeb and a good autom8 script can help here, so you would just have to enter the coordinates...

But that's all far in the future.

I don't know much about creating modules, but I think I will take a look at this...

Maybe a modified version of mechjeb and a good autom8 script can help here, so you would just have to enter the coordinates...

But that's all far in the future.

Yeah, tried to ask that i n the Mechjeb thread, but it got ignored

Hope you succeed!

This is low priority for now...

But for now you get new textures

have fun

greetings Themorris

I have noticed a bug wherein after launching a rocket from the silo part highlighting and selection in the spaceplane hanger is broken. I have confirmed this issue to be caused by this mod so I have sadly been forced to uninstall it until a fix is out but please keep up the good work this is getting to be fantastic very quickly
How did you produce or where did you find a hole in the ground big enough for this?
He actually made the terrain custom. You can tell if you spawn it from the KerbTown plugin
The terrain surrounding his silo certainly, but he'd still have to put that whole thing in a hole or there would be ground intersecting the silo and it'd look very strange.

Hi,

@Greys

You're totally right, I did find a hole between the hillsa few kilometers away from KSC, but all af the silo(exepct a bit of the custom grass pale) is above the ground

@LORDPrometheus

I will take a look at this, when I get home today and try to reproduce it

greetz

Themorris

Thats the opening style I wanted to use for my SS-18 silo. Right now I work on the model for my SS-18.

The silocover of the Minuteman III silo opens similar to mine.

greetings

Themorris

You can have the model if you want, i've decided not to bother building the rest of it

So,

I think I will be starting to work on a new silo at the weekend, so this

will fit in

It's an soviet R-36M (NATO: SS-18).

But I think I will be able to texture the old silo today or tomorrow.

greetings

Themorris

I love you! I wish I had the nerves to collect mods after every update...else I might wouldve played longer then 20 minutes since 0.20...

This is a dream object! Now only for a plugin that sets a flight trajectory like a real ICBM to a Target! North Kerbia has been threatening the world for to long! It's time for them to be Bombed back to the stone age! Now to install this and wait for tons of custom stuff to fill this silo to the brim!
My rockets always spawn under the ground and explode as soon as physics load... Any ideas how to fix this? I tried really small rockets (Mk1 pod, a tank, and an engine), but they still exploded!

My rockets always spawn under the ground and explode as soon as physics load... Any ideas how to fix this? I tried really small rockets (Mk1 pod, a tank, and an engine), but they still exploded!

Increase your terrain detail level in KSP Settings.

Now only for a plugin that sets a flight trajectory like a real ICBM to a Target!

There's a promising plugin on Spaceport, the "kOS Scriptable Autopilot".

This looks like a good start to script a ballistic guidance system. I already posted a comment to the author that it would be greatly appreciated, if he could open a thread here in the forum to discuss this very interesting plugin and the results that we can archieve with it.
